alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:32PM CDT until July 10 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ROOKS...SOUTHWESTERN JEWELL...SMITH...OSBORNE AND SOUTHEASTERN PHILLIPS COUNTIES... At 1030 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellaire to near Cedar to Natoma, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. In addition, at 1015 PM CDT an automated weather station measured a 57 MPH wind gust near Kirwin. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Smith Center, Osborne, Downs, Mankato, Natoma, Lebanon, Woodston, Gaylord, Alton, Portis, Esbon, Ionia, Athol, Harlan, Cedar and Bellaire. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
